name: Creature Creator
overview: Do the Monster Match. Explore the computer with fun-filled programming and pattern matching games. Build creatures by selecting heads, bodies, arms and legs. Literally thousands of different combinations. Learn programming fundamentals by making the creatures dance. Dance a duet with a twin partner created by the computer. Pattern recognition and matching activity. Perfect for individual or group play. A friendly, colorful learning game for children 4 to 8 years old.
